summary: A man discovers that his dumb, lovable nephew can see through objects and decides to unleash him into the world of gambling.
cast: Stephen Chow|Man-Tat Ng|Man Cheung|Sandra Kwan Yue Ng|Paul Chun|Yuen-Yan Lo|Corey Yuen|Jeffrey Lau|Yeung-Ming Wan|Sheila Chan|Ka-Sang Cheng|Miu Ting Kong|Szu-Ying Chien|Mei-Yee Sze|Ching Wai|Jameson Wa-Fan Lam|Yun-Chiang Peng|Huang-Hsi Liu|Yau-Kei Tang
title: Do sing
